    • Field Detail

      • IS_WINDOWS

        private static final java.lang.Boolean IS_WINDOWS
        Some of the unit tests don't seem to work on some versions of Windows. Given the tests take time AND the deployments will be via a Linux box, we'll skip them on Windows.
